system.availability: Wearer has no penalty from darkness, smoke, or mundane obstructions such as solid objects. Can use Psyscience as Untrained Basic skill, or gain +10 if already has it. Rolling doubles on perception test while using causes 1 insanity point. Gain 1d10 insanity and 1d5 corruption on seeing a daemon ( once per daemon).
system.cost: Xenotech Goggles whose lenses let you see into the warp, filtered such as to not immedietly drive the wearer mad. Always good craftsmanship. Made by Stryxis, might be purchasble.
